// minimal api wrapper
export async function getDevices(){const res=await fetch('/api/devices');return res.json();}export async function controlDevice(device_id,device_type,action,params){const res=await fetch('/api/device/control',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({device_id,device_type,action,params})});return res.json();}
